import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../CheckoutSteps' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart) return( <>

Shipping

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}

) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
